did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Scrapbooks of clippings, programs, ticket stubs, dance cards, photographs, and other memorabilia, kept while a student at The University of Arizona.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Scrapbooks of Warren J. Smith (AZ 039). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Warren J. Smith, 1964.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Scrapbooks of clippings, programs, ticket stubs, dance cards, photographs, and other memorabilia, kept while a student at The University of Arizona.
